name: v25.11.0-trunk.227
body:
Armbian rolling releases


- rolling releases are available at the bottom of official download pages - How to change type of images that are provided by Armbian? - How to switch between stable and rolling release? Please note that Armbian Rolling Releases are not recommended for production environments, as these builds are not thoroughly tested. However, in most cases, they should work well.

Weekly Digest

  • Add AM62P Starter Kit Support. by @Grippy98 in armbian/build#8624
  • Add DT overlay to operate RK3308 OTG USB port in Host mode. by @brentr in armbian/build#8642
  • add initial support of NanoPi M5. by @SuperKali in armbian/build#8651
  • add new board radxa-cm4-io. by @amazingfate in armbian/build#8604
  • Add rk3506 support and introduce new board armsom forge1. by @amazingfate in armbian/build#8619
  • add support for Bananapi M5 Pro board. by @efectn in armbian/build#8640
  • Bump mainline kernels to rc5 and disable 8189es. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/build#8650
  • extensions: add gxlimg and amlogic-fip-blobs. by @retro98boy in armbian/build#8626
  • fix(build): eliminate the error message when no extensions found in a folder in building. by @diverger in armbian/build#8656
  • IMX8 kernel 6.12.y: remove obsolete patch. by @schmiedelm in armbian/build#8648
  • kernel: split build and install into two steps. by @amazingfate in armbian/build#8617
  • Khadas VIM4: Update and Fixup U-Boot. by @pyavitz in armbian/build#8631
  • Radxa-e52c. Device NIC port rename to match device labels and network LED config via radxa-e52c.conf. by @schwar3kat in armbian/build#8633
  • rockchip64: current: fix some rk3588 boards stuck in initramfs stage. by @efectn in armbian/build#8612
  • rockchip: only install ap6330-initramfs-firmware hook when armbian firmware is installed. by @amazingfate in armbian/build#8618
  • sakurapi-rk3308b: add high speed conf for emmc and ufs for tf slot. by @LXY1226 in armbian/build#8653
  • SMART AM40: U-Boot: fix DWC DRD could not find phy and thus crashed. by @retro98boy in armbian/build#8635
  • sun55iw3: move patches to archive/sunxi-dev-6.16 folder. by @The-going in armbian/build#8641
  • sunxi 6.12: Switching to v6.12.47. by @The-going in armbian/build#8643
  • sunxi-6.16:. by @The-going in armbian/build#8655
  • uefi-loong64-6.16: add patch to enable xe driver build. by @amazingfate in armbian/build#8646
  • Update rockchip 32 bit edge kernel to 6.17. by @paolosabatino in armbian/build#8649
  • xpressreal-t3: Load modules for HW video decoding/encoding. by @wei633 in armbian/build#8590
